title: Saving Money and Saving Energy by Airwheel Intelligent Personal Transportation Electric Skateboards
text: Saving Money and Saving Energy by Airwheel Intelligent Personal Transportation Electric Skateboards No matter for office workers or students, they are all looking forward to the holiday. Many of them will take travelling as their first choice. Apart from such words as beautiful scenery there are other words can be heard, such as traffic jam. USA, 9 October 2015 -- In modern society, not only the office workers, but also students have much pressure to get ahead of the others. No matter for office workers or students, they are all looking forward to the holiday. During holiday, they can do many things to make them happy. Because they need to release form the heavy work or study. There are many ways to entertain themselves, such as doing sports, going shopping. Still, many of them will take travelling as their first choice. Apart from such words as beautiful scenery and local fine food, there are other words can be heard, such as traffic jam and standing a long queue or being exhausted. Do you want a care free travel? Try Airwheel M3 electric skateboards .Light and portable, Airwheel intelligent electric scooter is easy to carry around. Traveller can carry it when they do not use it. The design Airwheel Technology craves for has to deliver the core value of the product, integrate functions into the exterior and weave through every single detail. Airwheel products are designed to be fascinating, portable and environmentally friendly. There is no need for traveller to take tour bus or line up with Airwheel self-balancing electric scooter . Adopted with the magnetic levitating ultra-powerful motor, it ensures the Airwheel intelligent electric scooter is quiet without producing noise. Magnetic Levitation Motor is the latest technology. It replaces the bearing with magnetic suspension for longer life expectancy. Hence, people can ride it to visit museum. So far, Airwheel Technology has launched four series of intelligent electric scooters with their own features. There is always a suitable for the users, which have different needs. With more money and energy, they can fully enjoy the pleasure of travel. # # #
